name: Sweet Corn on The Cob Without the Cob
author: heather215
summary: I always seem to want sweet corn when it's not in season, and sometimes the canned sweet corn has a funky flavor. Now you can have quick sweet corn all year round! Using real salted butter makes a huge difference in this case. Tastes just like in-season corn on the cob.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Stir corn, butter, and sugar together in a saucepan over low heat; cook and stir until simmering, about 5 minutes
Season with salt and black pepper to taste
